body_content.explanation: the natural process by which people and especially children become able to understand and speak a language, without having lessons or learning rules:
examples: Language acquisition starts at a very young age.
This is an ideal text for students with little or no background in child language acquisition.
There are many mechanisms which contribute to language acquisition and development.

body_content.explanation: the process of learning to understand and speak a language:
examples: Language acquisition involves learning words as well as the rules for inflecting and combining them.
This book will also be of value to the general reader with an interest in second- and third-language acquisition.
